question: What types of companies can benefit from this application ?
answer: This Android application is designed for companies of all sizes, including retailers, wholesalers and small businesses.

question: Can I follow different types of inventory with this application ?
answer: Yes, you can easily add, modify and delete inventory items of different types in the application.

question: How does the app help me manage stock levels?
answer: The app allows you to monitor stock levels, set low-stock alerts, and receive notifications when stock levels fall below a certain threshold.

question: How to save and restore my data ?
answer: The application offers automatic backup feature on your device. You can also make manual backups and restore them at any time.

question: How am I informed of the application updates ?
answer: You will receive notifications when new updates are available on the Google Play Store.
